languages.text:
{n}Ульфар утирает с лица пахнущую машинной смазкой кровь и разражается оглушительным хохотом. Кажется, что сама твердь трясется от этого могучего проявления счастья.{/n}
"Смотри, Всеотец, сколь коротко мужество труса,
Сменились дерзкие гимны мольбой о спасении!
Но заняты длани мои тяжким оружием,
И нету в них милости места, и нет в них пощады!"

{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}
"Behold, Allfather,
how fleeting is
a coward's valour,
In stead of brazen hymns
pleas for salvation come!
But my hands are full,
with weapons laden,
Without a finger-span
for mercy
or for grace!"
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
{n}乌尔法身上沾满了地狱兽的鲜血，带着机油的刺鼻味道。他抹去了脸上的血迹，爆发出震耳欲聋的大笑声。在这震撼人心的笑声中，似乎连大地都在颤抖。{/n}
“看啊，全父！
懦夫的勇气，
是何等稍纵即逝！
转而颂唱无耻的赞美诗，
恳求救赎！
但我的双手，
紧握着武器。
没有一根手指，
可以赐予怜悯，
或是宽恕！”
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}
"Behold, Allfather,
how fleeting is
a coward's valour,
In stead of brazen hymns
pleas for salvation come!
But my hands are full,
with weapons laden,
Without a finger-span
for mercy
or for grace!"

恳求救赎！
但我的双手，
紧握着武器。
没有一根手指，
可以赐予怜悯，
或是宽恕！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}ウルファーはヘルブルートの血にまみれており、その血は機械油の酸っぱい臭いを強く漂わせている。ウルファーが顔についた血を拭うと、耳を裂くような大声で笑い出す。この雄々しい喜びの表現に、大地そのものが揺れるようだ。{/n}
「見よ、全知の父よ、
臆病者の勇気の
なんと儚いことか、
堂々と賛歌を奏でることなく
救済を懇願しようとは！
しかし我が手を埋めるは、
数々の武器、
指一本ほどもかけるものなし
慈悲であろうと
情けであろうと！」
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}
"Behold, Allfather,
how fleeting is
a coward's valour,
In stead of brazen hymns
pleas for salvation come!
But my hands are full,
with weapons laden,
Without a finger-span
for mercy
or for grace!"

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar está empapado de la sangre del Bruto Infernal, que lleva el acre sabor del aceite de máquina. Se limpia la sangre de la cara y estalla en una carcajada ensordecedora. El propio suelo parece temblar ante tal poderosa muestra de júbilo.{/n}
«Contempla, Padre de todas las cosas,
lo fugaz que es
el valor de un cobarde.
En lugar de bravíos cánticos,
¡solo recibo súplicas de redención!
Mas mis manos ocupadas
y cargadas de armas están,
¡sin un dedo libre
para la misericordia
o la gracia!».
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}
"Behold, Allfather,
how fleeting is
a coward's valour,
In stead of brazen hymns
pleas for salvation come!
But my hands are full,
with weapons laden,
Without a finger-span
for mercy
or for grace!"

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar est couvert du sang du Métabrutus dont se dégage l'odeur âcre de l'huile de machine. Il essuie son visage et éclate d'un rire tonitruant, une puissante manifestation de joie qui semble faire trembler le sol.{/n}
« Vois, ô Père de Tous,
combien est fugace
le courage d'un lâche
qui par de basses suppliques
remplace les hymnes héroïques !
Mais je n'ai entre les mains
que des armes de mort
et pas une once de pitié
ou de miséricorde à donner ! »
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}
"Behold, Allfather,

a coward's valour,
In stead of brazen hymns
pleas for salvation come!
But my hands are full,
with weapons laden,
Without a finger-span
for mercy
or for grace!"

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar ist mit dem Blut des Höllenschlächter durchtränkt, das beißend nach Maschinenöl riecht. Er wischt es sich vom Gesicht und bricht in ohrenbetäubendes Gelächter aus. Diese Bekundung der Freude scheint den Boden selbst zum Beben zu bringen.{/n}
"Seht nur, Allvater,
wie flüchtig doch
des Feiglings Mut ist,
und statt Hymnen der Kühnheit
ertönen Bitten um Erlösung!
Doch meine Hände
sind voller Waffen,
da ist kein Platz
für Gnade
oder Nachsicht!"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}

or for grace!"

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar, Tamu Kaçkını'nın makine yağının ekşi kokusunu taşıyan kanına bulanmış. Yüzündeki kanı silip kulak delici bir kahkaha patlatıyor. Bu görkemli sevinç gösterisi, yeri titretiyor.{/n}
"Gör bunu Yücebaba,
Yiğitliği korkakların
Korkaklara pek yaraşır.
Çınlayan ilahilerin mahalli
Kurtuluş yakarışında!
Benim ellerimse,
Silahların huzurunda.
Söyle, burada yer var mı ki
ne merhamete
ne de zarafete?"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar is drenched in the Helbrute's blood, which carries the acrid tang of machine oil. He wipes the blood from his face and bursts into deafening laughter. The ground itself seems to quake at this mighty display of joy.{/n}
"Behold, Allfather,
how fleeting is
a coward's valour,
In stead of brazen hymns
pleas for salvation come!
But my hands are full,
with weapons laden,
Without a finger-span
for mercy
or for grace!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ulfar, Şuursuz'un makine yağının ekşi kokusuna sahip kanına bulanmış. Yüzündeki kanı siliyor ve kulakları delen bir kahkaha patlatıyor. Bu görkemli neşe gösterisiyle yerler titriyor.{/n}
"Gör bunu Yücebaba,
bir korkağın yiğitliği
ne kadar da kısa sürüyor.
Çınlayan ilahilerin mahallinde
kurtuluş için yalvarıyor!
Fakat benim ellerim,
silahlarla doludur.
Yerim yoktur hiç
ne merhamete
ne de zarafete!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
